page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: {The Sele School Hexham The Sele School was built in 1856.The children stayed from ages 5-13.In 1874 the subsciption School started with 150 children.It became a junior and infant school in this century and then it became 2 first schools.Five years ago in 1980 it became one big first school. {School uniform The children at the Sele school have a uniform but it is not compulsry.There is a red jumper or cardigan and grey trousers or skirt.They start school when they are four and leave to the middle school at 9. {School meals A typical dinner is beans,chips, potatoes and mince.For pudding we have apple crumble,mouse or semolina.Some people have school milk.We have one third of a pint a day for 3 pence.
